C_BAT.disclaimer: <sup class="push-left">*</sup> Range shown for 85D and P85D is estimated, pending EPA confirmation. Range decreases 3 percent when equipped with 21-inch wheels.
C_BAT.name: Battery

C_CHG_SUPER.description:
Model S comes with the necessary equipment to charge at home or on the road. Charge at up to 29 miles per hour (40 amps).
  • Onboard charger
  • 240-volt adapter
  • Mobile connector
  • J1772 public charging station adapter
  • Standard household outlet adapter
C_CHG_SUPER.name: Charging

C_INT_NOW_DEFAULT_OPTS.note: This is a placeholder/dummy category that represents options that are now required under certain package interior options, but used to be UI visible, however still need to be visible to a customer in certain UI sections and official documents, order agreement, etc.
C_INT_NOW_DEFAULT_OPTS.name: Interior Package Default Options

C_OPTS.disclaimer: Rear Facing Seats are child restraint systems intended for children at least 3' 1" tall and between 35 and 77 pounds. Children should be seated upright without their head touching the roof of the car and be properly belted in at all times. It's important that you follow all provided instructions to ensure the safety of your passengers.
C_OPTS.name: Options

C_PERF.disclaimer:
Performance characteristics are estimated or determined by Tesla Motors, Inc. under certain driving, operating, and environmental conditions. Actual results will vary based on your driving habits and other factors.


** The P85D top speed is currently electronically-limited to 130 mph. In the coming months, we will be able to upgrade the car free of charge to enable a 155 mph top speed. This free update will be available for the lifetime of the car (not limited to the first owner). Additionally, an over-the-air firmware upgrade to the power electronics will improve P85D performance at high speed above what anyone outside Tesla has experienced to date. In other words, the car will be better than you experienced. This free upgrade will be rolled out in the next few months, once full validation is complete.
C_PERF.name: Model S Performance

C_STDEQ.description:
Model S comes standard with a forward looking camera, radar, and 360-degree ultrasonic sensors that actively monitor the surrounding roadway. Progressive software updates over time will enable sophisticated safety and convenience features that use these sensors to respond to real world conditions. Safety features include systems that warn drivers of potential hazards and help avoid or lessen the impacts of collisions. Convenience features include everyday driving maneuvers that reduce driver workload, such as traffic aware cruise control and automatic parking.

Safety features, today and in the future, are included in every Model S with Autopilot hardware. Convenience features will be included in the Tech Package. It will take several months for all the features to be completed and uploaded to the cars.
C_STDEQ.name: Autopilot

C_WT.disclaimer:
21-inch wheels are equipped with low-profile performance tires that provide less protection from, and are consequently more likely to suffer damage from, uneven road surfaces, debris, curbs, and other common obstacles. Damage to wheels or tires from these conditions are not covered under the Model S new vehicle limited warranty. 21-inch wheels with low-profile performance tires wear faster and reduce battery range compared to 19-inch wheels with all season tires. For best results, follow recommended tire maintenance including tire rotation. Model S does not come with a spare wheel and tire.

Low-profile performance tires are meant for summer use and will not have adequate traction in cold, snowy or icy conditions. We recommend driving on winter tires, available on both 21-inch and 19-inch wheels, in winter weather.
C_WT.name: Wheels

state_sponsored_incentives: Electric Vehicle IncentivesDepending on where you reside, you may be eligible for state sponsored tax incentives and rebates. These incentive programs vary by state and are offered and administered by government agencies. The requirements for eligibility and availability of the incentives are outside of Tesla’s control. Click here for additional information and be sure to visit the state program’s website for important details on eligibility and availability.
tesla_financing_disclaimer: Tesla LeasingThe amount due at signing includes the first month’s payment (as shown above), downpayment of $5,000 and acquisition fee of $700. Tax, title, license, registration and other fees are additional fees that are due at signing. The monthly lease payment is calculated based on the cash price of the vehicle as configured, monthly lease payments for 36 months, a $5,000 down payment and either 12,000 or 15,000 miles allowed per year (as selected above). Payments do not include applicable taxes. A $400 disposition fee is due at lease end. No security deposit is required. Tesla leasing is available in AL, AK, AR, AZ, CA, CO, CT, DC, FL, HI, ID, IL, IN, KS, MA, MD, ME, MN, MO, MT, NC, ND, NM, NV, NY, OH, OR, PA, SC, SD, TN, TX, UT, VA, VT, WA, WV and WY. Subject to credit approval; not everyone will qualify.
gasoline_savings_disclaimer:
Tesla LendingMonthly payments are calculated assuming an annual percentage rate (APR) of 3.00% for a term of 72 months with a 10% down payment.

Lending approval is based on your credit and program guidelines. Changes in term or down payment may change the annual percentage rate and are subject to change without notice. We have excluded sales tax, registration fees, and loan fees from the above calculator because they vary from state to state and in some cases, town to town. Lending is currently only available in the following states: CA, CO, FL, IL, MA, MN, MO, NC, NV, NY, OH, OR and WA. If you live outside of these states, contact us for alternate lending options.

Loans are offered through U.S. Bank and Wells Fargo. Neither U.S. Bank nor Wells Fargo is associated with the Guaranteed Resale Value. Some loans with low down payments will not have a Guaranteed Resale Value that exceeds the loan principal at month 36, but will before month 39. Learn more about Guaranteed Resale Value.
lease_disclaimer:
Gasoline SavingsGasoline savings assume an average driving distance of 15,000 miles per year, paying $0.11 per kilowatt hour for electricity, and paying $4.90 per gallon for premium gasoline with a fuel efficiency of 20 miles per gallon.



Price does not include taxes, license and title fees, or regionally required equipment, service, and charges.
name: CS_3_MS_US

AU01.description:
Ultra High Fidelity Sound envelops passengers in a concert hall like environment that uses 12 precisely positioned speakers to accurately reproduce sound and deliver it directly to passengers' ears. Its digital signal processing was developed with well known record producers and is precisely tuned for the speakers' placement inside the car. Our sound engineers even accounted for acoustic differences in the roof material by creating a different signal processing codec for standard and all glass panoramic roofs. The package includes:
  • XM satellite radio capability
  • 12 speakers with neodymium magnets including an 8" subwoofer
AU01.disclaimer:
XM satellite radio antenna is only compatible with the
All Glass Panoramic Roof
AU01.name: Ultra High Fidelity Sound

BC0R.description: Tesla Red four piston Brembo brake calipers.
BC0R.name: Tesla Red Brake Calipers

BT60.description:
• 208 miles range (EPA)
  • 380 hp motor power
  • 5.9 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 120 mph top speed
  • 8 year, 125,000 mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • Supercharging optional
BT60.name: 60 kWh Battery

BT85.description:
• 265 miles range (EPA)
  • 380 hp motor power
  • 5.4 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 140 mph top speed
  • 8 year, infinite mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • Supercharging included
BT85.name: 85 kWh Battery

CH01.description: Outfit Model S with a second onboard charger for up to twice the standard rate of charge, up to 58 miles of range per hour of charge, when combined with an 80 amp Wall Connector.
CH01.name: Dual Chargers

COL1.description: Solid Colors (available first 6 months of production)
COL1.name: Solid

COL2.description: Metallic colors (available at 7 months of production)
COL2.name: Metallic

COL3.description: Premium colors (available at 9 months of production)
COL3.name: Tesla Multi-coat

CW01.description:
Improve cold-weather comfort and convenience by adding:
  • 3 zone rear seat heaters
  • Wiper blade defrosters
  • Washer nozzle heaters
CW01.disclaimer:
Recommended for climates where temperatures
regularly fall well below freezing
CW01.name: Subzero Weather Package

CW02.description:
Improve cold-weather comfort and convenience by adding:
  • 3 zone rear seat heaters
  • Wiper blade defrosters
  • Washer nozzle heaters
  • Heated steering wheel
CW02.disclaimer:
Recommended for climates where temperatures
regularly fall well below freezing
CW02.name: No Subzero Weather Package

DSH7.description: Pair the premium headliner with an Alcantara dashboard panel that borders the instrument panel, climate control vents and 17" touchscreen.
DSH7.name: Black Alcantara Dashboard Accents

BT60.override_description:
• 225 miles range at 65 mph
  • 376 hp motor power
    188 hp front and rear
  • 5.7 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 125 mph top speed
  • 8 year, 125,000 mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • Supercharging optional

BT85.override_description:
• 270 miles range (EPA) *
  • 376 hp motor power
    188 hp front and rear
  • 5.2 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 155 mph top speed
  • 8 year, infinite mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • Supercharging included

PBT85.override_disclaimer:
Tech package, air suspension, 21" wheels
and next gen seats recommended

P85D.override_disclaimer: Tech package, air suspension, 21" wheels and next gen seats recommended
P85D.override_name: High Performance All-Wheel Drive Dual Motor

FG02.description: Cut through fog and illuminate obstacles on dark roads with LED fog lights that are controlled through the touchscreen. Our newly redesigned fog lights are designed to work with our LED cornering lights and headlights as a complete system.
FG02.name: Exterior Lighting Package

HP01.description: Designed to mimic the fluid, futuristic design of Model S, the Wall Connector is the fastest, easiest way to charge at home. The Wall Connector does not require Dual Chargers, but it will not reach its maximum 80 amp charging capability without them.
HP01.name: Wall Connector

IX01.description:
Wrap the interior of your car in the same luxurious Nappa leather used for our seats. Selectively chosen top-grade hides are minimally processed to retain their natural character. The result is an especially soft, smooth finish for the following surfaces:
  • Lower instrument panel
  • Armrests (door and console)
  • Driver airbag cover
IX01.name: Extended Nappa Leather Trim

LP01.description:
Add ambiance to Model S with strategically placed LED lights that illuminate without reflecting off the windshield. Interior lighting includes:
  • Door-panel ambient lights
  • Second-row footwell lights
  • Second-row puddle lights
LP01.name: Premium Interior Lighting

PA01.description:
Protect key areas of Model S against stone chips, bug damage, weathering and other paint damage. Paint Armor is clear film that is applied to:
  • Exterior mirrors
  • Front bumper, fascia and hood (nose)
  • Front and rear fender (trailing edge)
  • Front and rear rocker panels
  • Rear bumper fascia

Depending on the angle of sunlight, seams between protected and unprotected paint areas will be visible, particularly on white and pearl white cars.
PA01.name: Paint Armor

PBT85.description:
• 265 miles range (EPA)
  • 470 hp motor power
  • 4.2 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 130 mph top speed
  • 8 year, infinite mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • Supercharging and Alcantara headliner included
PBT85.name: 85 kWh Performance

P85D.description:
• 253 miles range (EPA) *
  • 691 hp motor power
    221 hp front, 470 hp rear
  • 3.2 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 155 mph top speed **
  • High performance All-Wheel Drive Dual Motor for exceptional power and handling with specially designed suspension
  • 8 year, infinite mile battery and drive unit warranty
P85D.name: 85 kWh Performance

PI01.description: Enhance your Model S with LED accent lighting and extended Nappa leather throughout the cabin. Selectively chosen top-grade hides are minimally processed to retain their natural character, covering the armrests, driver’s airbag cover, and lower dashboard.
PI01.disclaimer: Requires leather seats and Alcantara headliner
PI01.name: Premium Interior Package

PS01.description: Add extra privacy to the cargo area with the removable parcel shelf, which slides between the rear seats and rear window to shield belongings from view.
PS01.name: Parcel Shelf

PX01.description: Performance Plus adds world class handling to the incredible acceleration of Model S Performance, while also improving range. After hundreds of iterations affecting every detail of the suspension, our vehicle dynamics team was able to achieve the rare outcome of improving both performance and efficiency. In addition to upgraded dampers, bushings, stabilizer bars and tires (Michelin Pilot Sport PS2), the rear tires are 20 mm wider and staggered for improved acceleration on low grip surfaces. Range improves 6 to 12 miles over regular 21" wheels.
PX01.disclaimer: Requires P85 or P85D, Tech Package, Smart Air Suspension, and 21" Wheels
PX01.name: Performance Plus

TP02.description:
The Tech Package adds a host of features to an already advanced car.
  • Autopilot convenience features available through software updates
  • Onboard maps and navigation for North America with free updates for 7 years
  • LED Cornering lights and fog lamps
  • Automatic keyless entry
  • Lighted door handles
  • Power liftgate
  • Electrochromatic mirrors
  • Power folding, heated side mirrors with memory
  • GPS enabled Homelink
TP02.name: Tech Package with Autopilot

RFBC.description: Solid aluminum roof available in black or matching exterior paint. Not compatible with roof racks. To mount a roof rack, please choose the All Glass Panoramic Roof.
RFBC.name: Solid Roof

RFBK.description: Solid aluminum roof available in black or matching exterior paint. Not compatible with roof racks. To mount a roof rack, please choose the All Glass Panoramic Roof.
RFBK.name: Black

RFPO.description: Retractable roof made of lightweight safety glass which exceeds federal safety standards and blocks both 98% of ultraviolet light and 81% of solar heat. Standard with mounting points for roof racks.
RFPO.name: All Glass Panoramic Roof

SC00.comment: This option has the same info as its toggle_pair (SC01 - Supercharging) for use in the UI, but is actually the opposite (No Supercharging)
SC00.name: Supercharging Disabled

SC01.description: Tesla Superchargers are external chargers designed to replenish half of a charge in as little as 20 minutes. When enabled, there is no charge to use a Supercharger. This allows you to drive for free from coast to coast or anywhere our growing network of Superchargers will take you.
SC01.name: Supercharger Enabled

SR02.description: Customize your Model S cabin with private and comfortable executive rear seats. Both leather wrapped seats include two zone heaters and are separated by a wide center console with hidden storage. Rear seat passengers can control media, climate and panoramic roof settings with the Tesla app.
SR02.disclaimer:
Requires Premium Interior Package and includes
Subzero Weather Package
SR02.name: Executive Rear Seats

SU01.description: Automatically adjusts stiffness for optimum performance and ride regardless of road surface or cargo. Location aware, the air suspension automatically re-applies manual settings each time it nears previous GPS coordinates, particularly useful for steep driveways.
SU01.name: Smart Air Suspension

TR01.description: Carry up to 7 passengers in Model S by adding seating for two children with rear facing seats. Engineered to far exceed federal safety standards, they attach to a second frame that augments our standard bumper with high strength aluminum for the utmost protection. These comfortable seats are hand wrapped in black microfiber and synthetic leather and fold completely flat into the floor when not in use.
TR01.name: Rear Facing Seats

UTAB.description: Complement the interior of Model S with our premium Alcantara headliner, a high quality synthetic material that looks and feels like suede. It covers the trim above the windowsill and sun visors.
UTAB.name: Black Alcantara Headliner

UTAW.description: Complement the interior of Model S with our premium Alcantara headliner, a high quality synthetic material that looks and feels like suede. It covers the trim above the windowsill and sun visors.
UTAW.name: White Alcantara Headliner

WT21.description: Standard with Continental ExtremeContact tires for high performance in both wet and dry conditions.
WT21.name: 21" Turbine

WTAE.description: Improves range by 3 percent and comes standard with Goodyear Eagle RS-A2 high performance all-season tires.
WTAE.name: 19" Aero

WTSG.description: Standard with Continental ExtremeContact tires for high performance in both wet and dry conditions.
WTSG.name: 21" Turbine

WTSP.description: Standard with Continental ExtremeContact tires for high performance in both wet and dry conditions.
WTSP.name: 21" Turbine

WTSS.description: Standard with Continental ExtremeContact tires for high performance in both wet and dry conditions.

WTTB.description: Standard with Goodyear Eagle RS-A2 high performance all-season tires.
WTTB.name: 19" Cyclone

WTW4.description: Four standard 19" wheels with mounted Pirelli Winter Sottozero winter tires, size 245/45-19.
WTW4.name: 19" Winter Tire Set

WTW5.description: Four 21" wheels with mounted Pirelli Winter Sottozero winter tires, size 245/35-21. Winter wheels will be matched to your Model S.

X019.description: Improve high speed stability by adding the carbon fiber spoiler to your trunk lid. Made from lightweight, cross-woven carbon fibers with a matte epoxy finish.
X019.name: Carbon Fiber Spoiler
